front.title: Data Node Tags in YANG Modules

abstract.t: This document defines a method to tag data nodes that are associated with operation and management data in YANG modules. This method for tagging YANG data nodes is meant to be used for classifying data nodes or instance of data nodes from different YANG modules and identifying their characteristic data. Tags may be registered as well as assigned during the definition of the module, assigned by implementations, or dynamically defined and set by users. This document also provides guidance to future YANG data model writers; as such, this document updates RFC 8407.
